oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fan Fair International Show - 1980-06-14 - Tape # 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of the main stage recordings of the Fan Fair International Show. The recording comes from June 14, 1980. The tape features: host/performer, Charlie Daniels (musician); performer, Marie Bottrell (musician); performer, Roly Daniels (musician); performance group, Waldemar Matuska and TKO (musical group). Tape is labeled tape two of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Charlie Daniels; Marie Bottrell; Roly Daniels; Waldemar Matuska;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Ronnie Prophet is praised by Charlie Daniels, and Daniels introduces Marie Bottrell -- (00:38) One of These Days (Marie Bottrell) -- (03:25) Bottrell reflects on success -- (03:48) The Star (Marie Bottrell) -- (06:47) Bottrell introduces "The Flames of Evil Desire" -- (06:57) The Flames of Evil Desire (Marie Bottrell) -- (10:02) Daniels thanks Bottrell and introduces Roly Daniels -- (10:29) Gentle on My Mind (Roly Daniels) -- (16:32) Roly expresses his dream of being on the International Fan Fair stage -- (17:06) Good Hearted Woman (Roly Daniels) -- (21:57) Roly expresses his thank to the audience, and Roly recalls visiting Nashville to pursue his dream -- (23:28) Almost Someone (Roly Daniels) -- (27:49) Daniels introduces Waldemar Matuska and TKO -- (30:23) Ishida (Unconfirmed) (Waldemar Matuska and TKO) -- (33:47) Do Vezi (Unconfirmed) (Waldemar Matuska and TKO) -- (37:24) The Yellow Rose of Texas (Waldemar Matuska and TKO) -- (41:45) Charlie Daniels reflects on the special position the show holds -- (44:35) Legend of Wolly Swamp (Charlie Daniels) -- (49:12) In America (Charlie Daniels) -- (53:02) The Devil Went Down to Georgia (Charlie Daniels) -- (56:43) Orange Blossom Special [featuring goodbye voiceover] (Charlie Daniels)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Daniels, Charlie; Daniels, Charlie, 1936-; Bottrell, Marie; Daniels, Roy; Matuška, Waldemar;
